46.eng-name: The Book of Cutting off the Hand of the Thief

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Amrah that she heard 'Aishah say:"The hand of the thief is to be cut off for one-quarter of a Dinar or more." (Sahih) Abu 'Abdur-Rahman (An-Nasai) said: This is the correct version of the narration of Yahya

chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the Differences Reported from Az-Zuhri
